#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install pid-childs
```

#### Scripts usage
command|`usage`
-|-
`pid-childs` |`usage: pid-childs pid`

#### Examples
```bash
$ pid-childs <parent-pid>
<child-pid1>
<child-pid2>
...
```
